name: Dimensional Maneuvers

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Ability to use the abundant step class feature or cast dimension door, Dimensional Agility, Dimensional Assault, Dimensional Dervish, base attack bonus +9.

sections.body: While using the Dimensional Dervish feat, you gain a +4 bonus on combat maneuver checks to bull rush, disarm, reposition, or trip an opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your rapid teleportation makes your combat maneuvers more difficult to avoid.
